name: Shot. Dash. Kill
description:
Shot your projectile, Dash to recover it and Kill the enemies!

The mafia mobs didn't want to go to Timmy's birthday party and now Timmy is VERY ANGRY with them, and won't let them get too far in life after being this mean to him...

A small and fun arcade-like game made by three students at ENTI UB - Spain.

The game is meant to be played with a keyboard and a mouse but has also full support for xbox controller and most of the buttons are remappable.

Any kind of feedback is accepted on our twitter: @CrunchyExtra

A Game made by Extra Crunchy Studios

  • Francesc Aguiló - @FulldeAwA
  • Alex Asenjo - @senjox
  • Salvio Calvillo - @CalvilloSalvio

Music attribution:

  • Godfather theme remix - Trap This Music
  • Megalovania remix - Kidokat
  • Freaks - Timmy Trumpet
  • Escape from Midwich Valley - Carpenter Brut

Instructions to play:

  1. Download the .zip
  2. Extract it anywhere
  3. Click on Shot Dash Kill.exe
